New York Post reported. Ken Auletta , author of`` Googled: The End of the World as We Know It,'' told Bloomberg TV that Eric Schmidt may be weighing a role in the Obama administration. Maybe he'll find some kind of astonishing offer, either at a startup or at a foundation or from a political unit, but today, he's hanging on to the right to define his job as he sees fit while continuing to make a pile of money, said Whit Andrews, a Shrewsbury, Mass.-based analyst at Gartner Inc.`` Why wouldn't you stay?
